response.original_title: Don't Get Mad... I Fucked Your Dad!
response.overview: Most BFFs have some competitive streak between them. As long as it's, "Who takes the hotter selfie?" and "Who has the better fashion sense?", there's no issue. But competition can turn dark...like girls fucking their best friends' Dad just to prove who's the hottest! Follow the story in "Don't Get MAD...I FUCKED your DAD!" You'll be left fantasizing about exploring your own sexcapades!
response.tagline: How far would you go to prove your point?
response.title: Don't Get Mad... I Fucked Your Dad!
